Select Board

Mission Statement

The Select Board is statutorily charged to "manage the prudential affairs" of the town (RSA 41:8). It is this Board's goal to do so in a fair and impartial manner. We strive to efficiently implement the objectives of the town as determined by our legislative body, the Town Meeting. We encourage citizen participation in all our discussions and hope you will feel free to contact us whenever you have a question or concern regarding our community. Our primary goal is to guide Stratham in remaining a progressive, expanding, inclusive community while maintaining the fiscally prudent path of our forefathers. Above all else, we endeavor to keep Stratham the pastoral community we all love.

We have tried to make our website informative, intuitive, and easy to use. We welcome your suggestions on how to make it better!

Click here to email the Select Board.
